column2: Are you one of the Merchants?
Yes
No
What merchants? I don't know what you are talking about
Excellent! We require more weapons! We can't defeat the redcaps without your help
What weapons?
Sure.
Redcaps? Who are they?
Then who are you, and on who's side are you? Ours, or the redcaps?
We are on your side
We are on the redcaps side
We don't even know who these sides are
Some honorable merchants from the stars have been supplying us with weapons to fight the Redcaps.
I see
The ones you have been selling us
Let's see what I have got
I am not going to sell you weapons
We will pay you handsomely as usual
The redcaps are the most morally corrupt members of our species. They must be destroyed to ensure the survival of our species
I will help you
I will not help you, I will help the redcaps
Isn't there a possibility to end this conflict peacefully?
Great! If you find any redcaps, kill them!
What? Die redcap-friend!!!
It is impossible to talk to the redcaps.
